title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 56.4, Long 298.3 ), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Nain, Canada, 0.5 sec, Magnetometer Array for Cusp and Cleft Studies (MACCS) - Erik S. Steinmetz (Augsburg College, steinmee@augsburg.edu)

info.contact: Erik S. Steinmetz @ Augsburg College, steinmee@augsburg.edu

parameters.name: thg_mag_nain
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_nain
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_nain']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_nain
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_nain']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_nain
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_nain']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
